aboutMeTextLeft: Hello! My name is Kyrylo Homenko, and I am a FullStack Web developer. I am a Ukrainian creative professional who is continuously evolving in this field. I started working in web development in 2022, learning through courses and concurrently studying technologies such as HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and other in-demand technologies.
aboutMeTextRight: Currently, I am actively engaged in work and personal growth in this sphere while pursuing higher technical education in Europe. With over 800 hours of practical experience under my belt, numerous satisfied clients, and a multitude of completed projects, I'm dedicated to further advancing in the world of web development!

optimizationBody: Productivity and usability are my priority. I optimize the project for quick download and adapt it to various devices and browsers.
deadlineBody: I guarantee delivery of the finished project within the agreed time. Once youâ€™re done, you get a fully functioning, ready-to-use project.
supportBody: I am ready to provide long-term support to your project, including updating and expansion of functionality to meet the requirements of the market and remain relevant.
iWillContactYou: I will contact you within 1 business day to discuss further details!
